bomberman.game.activeelements

Class Explosion

  • java.lang.Object
    • bomberman.game.elements.GameElement
      • bomberman.game.activeelements.ActiveElement
        • bomberman.game.activeelements.Explosion

  • public class Explosion
extends ActiveElement
    Class used to instantiate explosion after removing the corresponding bomb. THis class is used only in multiplayer games.
    Author:
    thebomberman
